reuters.title: ENVIROPACT <VIRO> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
reuters.body: Enviropact Inc said it has signed a letter of intent to acquire Willms Trucking Co Inc for about 12.5 mln dlrs, with completion expected in 45 days. In the year ended September 30, Willms had revenues of about 15 mln dlrs. It transports hazardous waste, sand and gravel. Reuter 
